products.title: Turin 25mm Striped Silver Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Their range of decorative slats are the perfect alternative to a plain, single colour venetian blind. This striped grey venetian blind is the ideal choice to add an understated yet stylish pattern to any room in your home. Product id: db-dven0329 fabric colour: striped silver s25069 material: aluminium headrail: plain steel silver rails | face or top fix brackets slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: cord & wand energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes turin 25mm striped silver aluminium venetian in grey.
